item.title: JSLT
item.description: My team at Indeed has a GraphQL service which can query various data sources and a Spring Boot application which fetches data from the GraphQL service and massages the retrieved JSON into a flattened and simplified format. We use JSLT to transform JSON. Today, I wrote a JSLT program to do de-duplication and array intersection. Below is the context: My GraphQL query: query MyQuery(...) { arrayA: someModel(...) { someInnerModel { id } }, arrayB: someModel(.
